__TOC__
== Notes ==
'''Banks''' are a place to store gold and items. Visiting a bank and saying aloud "bank" will open your bank box. You can also single left click bank NPCs and click Open Bankbox. Saying "balance" will show your total amount of banked gold pieces. When you wish to carry large amounts of gold, type "check #", where # is any value of gold 5000 or above. Checks are blessed.

Bankboxes can store no more than 125 items, and an unlimited amount of stones.
== Locations ==
[[Britain]](x3), [[Buccaneer's Den]], [[Cove]], [[Jhelom]], [[Minoc]], [[Moonglow]], [[Nujel'm]], [[Ocllo]], [[Serpent's Hold]], [[Skara Brae]], [[Trinsic]](x2), [[Vesper]], [[Yew]]
